scripts.ci-build: npm i -g wasm-pack && npm run build-all
scripts.build-all: npm run build-wasm && npm run build-lib
scripts.build-wasm: cd .. && cargo test && wasm-pack build --out-dir ts-lib/src/pkg --out-name rooc
scripts.build-wasm:debug: cd .. && wasm-pack build  --out-dir ts-lib/src/pkg --out-name rooc --target deno
scripts.test-ci: npm run build-wasm:debug && npm run test
